reviews.customers_say: Customers love this sweater's quality, describing it as a darling unique piece with a right fit and color options, particularly appreciating the fabulous guacamole green shade.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love, love, love this gorgeous sweater!!!!
items.body: I love, love, love this sweater and I wish I could give it more stars. It’s well made and is the perfect weight for California where it gets chillly but not too cold. I’m 5’4 and the length of the medium is perfect. The light blue is so pretty with the brown and white flowers. I can’t recommend this enough. Read more
items.author: Shannon Claudio

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, so cute & true to size
items.body: Love this sweater! I bought the green and it’s gorgeous, great quality, soft and fits perfectly. I’m 5”6” tall and 120 lbs. I bought a size small. I loved it so much I ordered another one in pink. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty sweater, not so soft
items.body: I get a ton of compliments on this sweater. It looks really nice. It fits well, it looks super soft. But it is not soft. Its not super scratchy or anything but it definitely is not soft like it looks. Read more
items.author: Kelli

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A no brainer. Dress it up or down.
items.body: Adorable for young or old. I wear a small however I bought a medium because I wear a blouse / dress cotton T-shirt under it. Fits great. Perfect with jeans. Actually you can dress it up or down. I’ve got compliments each time I’ve worn it. Can’t believe the quality for the price. Wish they had more colors. Wash delicate and lay flat to dry. Looks like it would be hot but it’s not. Thick but not hot. Read more
items.author: Deborah T

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Cute, Casual Sweater
items.body: I am very pleased with this sweater. I ordered the pink, which has a heathered look, a little lighter than it appears online. The sweater is heavy weight and will be very warm this winter. When I first felt the sweater in the bag I was afraid it was going to be itchy, but it's not. I am 5'3", 160 lbs and I ordered a large. It fits well. It is not a long sweater and may be considered a little boxy, but it works for me. Read more
items.author: Skye

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty flowers are so cheerful
items.body: True to size. It’s more of a double knit because of the flower detail- so quite warm. I have worn it twice and got compliments both times. The green a dark olive & is what I was expecting and quite pretty. I paired it with a camel skirt and and a light camisole. Very cute Read more
items.author: Sweet

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater, but boxy on me
items.body: I really wanted to like this based on the pictures, but it was very boxy on me. Another thing I was concerned about was the button holes, they were very small for the buttons and I am pretty sure they would end up just ripping. The sweater was nice and cute. I really wanted to keep it, but it just wasn’t flattering on me. Read more
items.author: Renae Bertolero

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty
items.body: Pretty sweater, very soft not itchy. Read more
items.author: Nancy Lewis

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Beau Blue, Blue, Black, Camel, Navy Blue, Rose Red, Pink, White, Beige, Yellow, Guacamole Green, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
